title: Why the fuck do woketards have to feel the need to force people to show their gender "pronouns" when they should take obvious damn hints on what people are and why the fuck do many people cave in to them and give their gender "pronouns"?

body: Honest answer? Mental illness, emotional problems.

post.title: Why the fuck do woketards have to feel the need to force people to show their gender "pronouns" when they should take obvious damn hints on what people are and why the fuck do many people cave in to them and give their gender "pronouns"?

body:
why they do it? emotional immaturity and low societal value. they offer nothing to society so they have to act in extreme, nonsensical ways so people pay attention to them

they will often pick a groups that is actually, or supposedly oppressed, because for some reason being oppressed it cool and/or being oppressed tm will get you the most attention and/or sympathy.

as to why people go along with it, even when they object...well...it's all so tiresome....

post.title: Why the fuck do woketards have to feel the need to force people to show their gender "pronouns" when they should take obvious damn hints on what people are and why the fuck do many people cave in to them and give their gender "pronouns"?

body:
My response to the pronoun game is "My pronouns are none of your business." or in text "My pronouns are None/Of/Your Business"

You'd be amazed how many people say "What am I supposed to call you then?" as their follow-up question.

body:
I make it clear to them they ate insulting the way I was raised....NORMAL. 
They do it for drama and to gain more material for their fantasy victim mentality....so I gave them drama I know they cant handle lol. 
Plus I have always been a rebel.....but this is they first over something so stupid.

I also think it stems from them being so boring and empty inside.

If you can persuade people into accepting something which they know is absurd, then what else will they concede to?
